attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
putting barcodes on cash notes can allow a new system to identify each note
and allow banks and shops to log notes in and out as they go, so if there was to be a robbery then all missing notes can be logged as stolen so banks and shops will be able to tell before transaction as to weather the cash is stolen and therefore allowing them to decline the transaction making the money no more value than a bit of paper
